item.name: Ageless Sentinels
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying When Ageless Sentinels blocks, it becomes a Bird Giant, and it loses defender. (It's no longer a Wall. This effect lasts indefinitely.)

item.name: Astral Steel
item.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Aven Farseer
item.text: Flying Whenever a permanent is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Farseer.
item.flavorText: His enemies' trickery and deceit only fuel his righteous anger.

item.name: Aven Liberator
item.text: Flying Morph {3}{W} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Aven Liberator is turned face up, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.name: Daru Spiritualist
item.text: Whenever a Cleric creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: He lifts the spirits of his people so they may descend in wrath upon their foes.

item.name: Daru Warchief
item.text: Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Soldier creatures you control get +1/+2.
item.flavorText: His victories speak for him.

item.name: Dawn Elemental
item.text: Flying Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Dawn Elemental.
item.flavorText: It was midnight on the Daru Plains, yet it seemed the sun was rising.

item.name: Decree of Justice
item.text: Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

item.name: Dimensional Breach
item.text: Exile all permanents. For as long as any of those cards remain exiled, at the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns one of the exiled cards he or she owns to the battlefield.

item.name: Dragon Scales
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Scales from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

item.name: Dragonstalker
item.text: Flying, protection from Dragons
item.flavorText: "When the skies are filled with flames, the brave shall step forward to quench them." —Order prophecy

item.name: Eternal Dragon
item.text: Flying {3}{W}{W}: Return Eternal Dragon from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Exiled Doomsayer
item.text: All morph costs cost {2} more. (This doesn't affect the cost to cast creature spells face down.)
item.flavorText: He's desperate to hold back the future because he has seen it.

item.name: Force Bubble
item.text: If damage would be dealt to you, put that many depletion counters on Force Bubble instead. When there are four or more depletion counters on Force Bubble, sacrifice it. At the beginning of each end step, remove all depletion counters from Force Bubble.

item.name: Frontline Strategist
item.text: Morph {W} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.

item.name: Gilded Light
item.text: You gain shroud until end of turn. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: "Whoever survives the first blow lives to land the second."

item.name: Guilty Conscience
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.
item.flavorText: Those who most feel guilt don't need to, while those who most need to feel guilt never do. —Order proverb

item.name: Karona's Zealot
item.text: Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

item.name: Noble Templar
item.text: Vigilance Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Rain of Blades
item.text: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
item.flavorText: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

item.name: Recuperate
item.text: Choose one — You gain 6 life; or prevent the next 6 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
item.flavorText: "Rise once more, so you may continue to destroy our enemies." —Karona, false god

item.name: Reward the Faithful
item.text: Any number of target players each gains life equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
item.flavorText: "When you have drunk your fill, pass the cup to others who thirst."

item.name: Silver Knight
item.text: First strike, protection from red
item.flavorText: Otaria's last defense against the wave of chaos threatening to engulf it.

item.name: Trap Digger
item.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Put a trap counter on target land you control. Sacrifice a land with a trap counter on it: Trap Digger deals 3 damage to target attacking creature without flying.

item.name: Wing Shards
item.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.name: Wipe Clean
item.text: Exile target enchantment. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: "The light of the Ancestor will scour the taint of darkness from the land."

item.name: Zealous Inquisitor
item.text: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.
item.flavorText: "I only return what rightly belongs to another."

item.name: Aphetto Runecaster
item.text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "The ignorant fear change; the wise use it as a weapon."

item.name: Brain Freeze
item.text: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Coast Watcher
item.text: Flying, protection from green
item.flavorText: The aven came to fear the forest's clawing branches, but the watchers quickly renewed their courage.

item.name: Day of the Dragons
item.text: When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then put that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

item.name: Decree of Silence
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter that spell and put a depletion counter on Decree of Silence. If there are three or more depletion counters on Decree of Silence, sacrifice it. Cycling {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Silence, you may counter target spell.

item.name: Dispersal Shield
item.text: Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
item.flavorText: "Maybe next time."

item.name: Dragon Wings
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Wings from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

item.name: Faces of the Past
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, tap all untapped creatures that share a creature type with it or untap all tapped creatures that share a creature type with it.
item.flavorText: The ties that bind can also strangle.

item.name: Frozen Solid
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

item.name: Hindering Touch
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Long-Term Plans
item.text: Search your library for a card, shuffle your library, then put that card third from the top.
item.flavorText: "Wait, it'll come to me in a minute."

item.name: Mercurial Kite
item.text: Flying Whenever Mercurial Kite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.name: Metamorphose
item.text: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: If it's not one thing, it's another.

item.name: Mind's Desire
item.text: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.) Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.name: Mischievous Quanar
item.text: {3}{U}{U}: Turn Mischievous Quanar face down. Morph {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Mischievous Quanar is turned face up, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for that copy.

item.name: Mistform Warchief
item.text: Creature spells you cast that share a creature type with Mistform Warchief cost {1} less to cast. {T}: Mistform Warchief becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.

item.name: Parallel Thoughts
item.text: When Parallel Thoughts enters the battlefield, search your library for seven cards, exile them in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library. If you would draw a card, you may instead put the top card of the pile you exiled into your hand.

item.name: Pemmin's Aura
item.text: Enchant creature {U}: Untap enchanted creature. {U}: Enchanted creature gains flying until end of turn. {U}: Enchanted creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) {1}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Raven Guild Initiate
item.text: Morph—Return a Bird you control to its owner's hand. (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: The Raven Guild soars on winds of unease.

item.name: Raven Guild Master
item.text: Whenever Raven Guild Master deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top ten cards of his or her library. Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Riptide Survivor
item.text: Morph {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Riptide Survivor is turned face up, discard two cards, then draw three cards.

item.name: Rush of Knowledge
item.text: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
item.flavorText: "Limitless power is glorious until you gain limitless understanding." —Ixidor, reality sculptor

item.name: Scornful Egotist
item.text: Morph {U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: "Once I was human. Now I am far more."

item.name: Shoreline Ranger
item.text: Flying Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Stifle
item.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
item.flavorText: "If I wanted your opinion, I'd have told you what it was." —Pemmin, Riptide survivor

item.name: Temporal Fissure
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Thundercloud Elemental
item.text: Flying {3}{U}: Tap all creatures with toughness 2 or less. {3}{U}: All other creatures lose flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Some days it's better to stay inside.

item.name: Bladewing's Thrall
item.text: Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon. When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Cabal Conditioning
item.text: Any number of target players each discards a number of cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
item.flavorText: "Hear only the Cabal's voice. See only the Cabal's way. Speak only the Cabal's word." —Cabal mantra

item.name: Cabal Interrogator
item.text: {X}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Call to the Grave
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

item.name: Carrion Feeder
item.text: Carrion Feeder can't block. Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
item.flavorText: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

item.name: Chill Haunting
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Chill Haunting, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

item.name: Clutch of Undeath
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.
item.flavorText: The hand of death recognizes its own.

item.name: Consumptive Goo
item.text: {2}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on Consumptive Goo.
item.flavorText: Silent as fog and relentless as plague, it is wet, creeping death.

item.name: Death's-Head Buzzard
item.text: Flying When Death's-Head Buzzard is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

item.name: Decree of Pain
item.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way. Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.name: Dragon Shadow
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Shadow from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

item.name: Fatal Mutation
item.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "You wear that shell as a mask. Now it's your coffin." —Cabal cleric

item.name: Final Punishment
item.text: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.
item.flavorText: The pain of a lifetime—every scrape, illness, and bruise—condensed into a single moment.

item.name: Lethal Vapors
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy it. {0}: Destroy Lethal Vapors. You skip your next turn. Any player may activate this ability.
item.flavorText: The vapors infiltrate every crevice, poison every lung, and snuff out every life.

item.name: Lingering Death
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature.
item.flavorText: "Looks bad. I don't know if he'll make it through the night." —Cabal cleric

item.name: Nefashu
item.text: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.

item.name: Putrid Raptor
item.text: Morph—Discard a Zombie card. (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: It eagerly gobbles up bits of its own rotting flesh as they fall to the swampy ground.

item.name: Reaping the Graves
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Skulltap
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Skulltap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: "Finally, a use for that head of yours." —Braids, dementia summoner

item.name: Soul Collector
item.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn is put into a graveyard, return that card to the battlefield under your control. Morph {B}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Tendrils of Agony
item.text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Twisted Abomination
item.text: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Unburden
item.text: Target player discards two cards. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Cabal initiates enter training full of hopes and fears. They graduate with neither.

item.name: Undead Warchief
item.text: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.
item.flavorText: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

item.name: Unspeakable Symbol
item.text: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
item.flavorText: The symbols are spread throughout Aphetto, marking sites where minions of the Raven Guild and the Cabal can seek refuge.

item.name: Vengeful Dead
item.text: Whenever Vengeful Dead or another Zombie is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
item.flavorText: Those who don't learn from their deaths are destined to repeat them.

item.name: Zombie Cutthroat
item.text: Morph—Pay 5 life. (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: The single-mindedness of a zombie, the cunning of an assassin.

item.name: Bonethorn Valesk
item.text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, Bonethorn Valesk deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Barbarians weave its spurs into ceremonial charms to proclaim their hardiness in battle.

item.name: Carbonize
item.text: Carbonize deals 3 damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

item.name: Chartooth Cougar
item.text: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Decree of Annihilation
item.text: Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands. Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Annihilation, destroy all lands.

item.name: Dragon Breath
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

item.name: Dragon Mage
item.text: Flying Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.
item.flavorText: "You'll bend to my will—with or without your precious sanity."

item.name: Dragon Tyrant
item.text: Flying, trample Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dragon Tyrant unless you pay {R}{R}{R}{R}. {R}: Dragon Tyrant gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
item.flavorText: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

item.name: Dragonstorm
item.text: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.name: Enrage
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry."

item.name: Extra Arms
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Perhaps extra heads would have served them better." —Foothill guide

item.name: Form of the Dragon
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of each end step, your life total becomes 5. Creatures without flying can't attack you.

item.name: Goblin Brigand
item.text: Goblin Brigand attacks each turn if able.
item.flavorText: After the Skirk Ridge collapsed, the goblins erected a system of ropes and pulleys to hold up what was left.

item.name: Goblin Psychopath
item.text: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.
item.flavorText: The destruction he causes is nothing next to the chaos in his mind.

item.name: Goblin War Strike
item.text: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.
item.flavorText: "Fire, aim, ready"

item.name: Goblin Warchief
item.text: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblin creatures you control have haste.
item.flavorText: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

item.name: Grip of Chaos
item.text: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random. (Select from among all legal targets.)
item.flavorText: When the world is consumed by chaos, the skilled and the foolish are on equal footing.

item.name: Misguided Rage
item.text: Target player sacrifices a permanent.
item.flavorText: Only when the anger passed did Varv realize he had burned down his home, destroyed his weapons, and killed his friend Furt.

item.name: Pyrostatic Pillar
item.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Pyrostatic Pillar deals 2 damage to that player.

item.name: Rock Jockey
item.text: You can't cast Rock Jockey if you've played a land this turn. You can't play lands if you've cast Rock Jockey this turn.
item.flavorText: Goblins don't know much about physics, but they know lots about falling and rocks.

item.name: Scattershot
item.text: Scattershot deals 1 damage to target creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Siege-Gang Commander
item.text: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Skirk Volcanist
item.text: Morph—Sacrifice two Mountains. (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Skirk Volcanist is turned face up, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

item.name: Spark Spray
item.text: Spark Spray deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: It's the only kind of shower goblins will tolerate.

item.name: Sulfuric Vortex
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

item.name: Torrent of Fire
item.text: Torrent of Fire deals damage equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Dragon fire melts any instrument designed to measure it.

item.name: Uncontrolled Infestation
item.text: Enchant nonbasic land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
item.flavorText: The grounds of the Riptide Project are now populated only by slivers, broken beakers, and the lonely screeching of gulls.

item.name: Accelerated Mutation
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
item.flavorText: Its food just got a lot smaller and its stomach a lot bigger.

item.name: Alpha Status
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares a creature type with it.
item.flavorText: The best leaders are made by their followers.

item.name: Ambush Commander
item.text: Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands. {1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Ancient Ooze
item.text: Ancient Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to the total converted mana cost of other creatures you control.
item.flavorText: The ooze has always been. The ooze will always be.

item.name: Break Asunder
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: "No good will come of this."

item.name: Claws of Wirewood
item.text: Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.

item.name: Decree of Savagery
item.text: Put four +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Cycling {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Savagery, you may put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.

item.name: Divergent Growth
item.text: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: Nature has forgotten its own rules.

item.name: Dragon Fangs
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Fangs from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

item.name: Elvish Aberration
item.text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Fierce Empath
item.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or more, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Forgotten Ancient
item.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
item.flavorText: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

item.name: Hunting Pack
item.text: Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.name: Krosan Drover
item.text: Creature spells you cast with converted mana cost 6 or more cost {2} less to cast.
item.flavorText: "Sit."

item.name: Krosan Warchief
item.text: Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
item.flavorText: It turns prey into predator.

item.name: Kurgadon
item.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 6 or more, put three +1/+1 counters on Kurgadon.
item.flavorText: When it walks through Krosa, trees step aside, leaves take wing, and the ground shudders.

item.name: One with Nature
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Primitive Etchings
item.text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a creature card this way, draw a card.
item.flavorText: Ancient carvings in the trees of Krosa glow with power once again.

item.name: Root Elemental
item.text: Morph {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Root Elemental is turned face up, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.name: Sprouting Vines
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.name: Titanic Bulvox
item.text: Trample Morph {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: With natural laws abandoned, excess thrives.

item.name: Treetop Scout
item.text: Treetop Scout can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: At home among the swaying, supple branches of the treetops, some scouts live their entire lives never touching ground.

item.name: Upwelling
item.text: Mana pools don't empty as steps and phases end.
item.flavorText: Once again, Kamahl felt the full force of the Mirari's pull, but he had learned much since the last time.

item.name: Wirewood Guardian
item.text: Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
item.flavorText: Tall as a tree and probably related.

item.name: Wirewood Symbiote
item.text: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.
item.flavorText: It drinks fatigue.

item.name: Woodcloaker
item.text: Morph {2}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Woodcloaker is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

item.name: Xantid Swarm
item.text: Flying Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't cast spells this turn.
item.flavorText: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.

item.name: Bladewing the Risen
item.text: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Edgewalker
item.text: Cleric spells you cast cost {W}{B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Cleric spell with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to cast.)

item.name: Karona, False God
item.text: Haste At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps Karona, False God and gains control of it. Whenever Karona attacks, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Sliver Overlord
item.text: {3}: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. {3}: Gain control of target Sliver. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: The end of evolution.

item.name: Ark of Blight
item.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Ark of Blight: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: When opened, it erases entire landscapes from minds and maps.

item.name: Proteus Machine
item.text: Morph {0} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Proteus Machine is turned face up, it becomes the creature type of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

item.name: Stabilizer
item.text: Players can't cycle cards.
item.flavorText: "Hold that thought." —Pemmin, Riptide survivor

item.name: Temple of the False God
item.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.
item.flavorText: Those who bring nothing to the temple take nothing away.
